column1: We have much to be thankful for today and every day. My family and I wish you a #HappyThanksgiving marked by gratitude and love. #GiveThanks #Thankful https://t.co/Vpee7Z7PC8

Chuck Schumer: “Next we take Georgia then we change America.”  AOC is all-in too saying she’s focused on making sure Democrats don’t have to negotiate with a GOP Senate.  The stakes are high and clear. Help @Perduesenate and @KLoeffler #HoldTheLine ⤵️  https://t.co/TmmMVfUuUz

We honor the generations of Americans who have answered their nation’s call to serve and defend sacrificing to ensure we get to live in freedom and security. This #VeteransDay be sure to thank a former service member for what they’ve given. We owe them our respect & gratitude 🇺🇸 https://t.co/JDIT6LdsLc

I’m pleased @KLoeffler has advanced to GA’s special Senate election runoff. She’s a conservative fighter who needs our support to help her reach victory in January. Please consider helping ensure Kelly has the resources to finish this race strong.  Donate: https://t.co/1OtcRuhRVs

My colleague @Perduesenate is a leader and distinct voice in Washington. He needs support in his expected runoff election in GA two short months from now. Help protect the Senate Majority and keep this seat in Republican hands by giving to his campaign.   https://t.co/HHMFGicSUB
It also means ensuring a fair process through the courts to resolve questions and challenges.  American voters deserve nothing less. (2/2)
Our country’s elections require integrity and trust to work. That means every legal vote should be counted with transparency and accountability in accordance with each state’s laws. (1/2)

Congratulations also to our other congressional delegation members @Crawford4Cong @womack4congress and @WestermanAR on their victories this evening. I’m pleased Arkansans recognize the stellar representation we have in them along with @TomCottonAR and @ElectFrench. #arpx #ARGOP

Congratulations to French Hill. He and the entire @ElectFrench team worked incredibly hard to show #AR02 voters how effective French is as their congressman and the results he delivers for central Arkansas. I’m proud to call him a friend and colleague. Well done! #arpx https://t.co/D8fHSwpWH2

Congratulations to my friend @TomCottonAR on winning another term to represent Arkansas in the US Senate. I know he’ll continue to be a leader and champion for Arkansas values and the interests of of our great state. Looking forward to more years of working side-by-side with Tom. https://t.co/PrvuOQDh2L

Just voted on this beautiful Arkansas fall day. Special thanks to the poll workers for their willingness to serve our communities. Exercise your right to #vote and honor the generations of men & women who have defended and sacrificed for the ability to freely choose our leaders. https://t.co/rudefAefax
It’s #ElectionDay and central Arkansas needs to VOTE for @ElectFrench.  Make your voice heard and send French Hill back to Congress to fight for you! #ARGOP #arpx https://t.co/fhmuX1wEMd

In Arkansas holding the line in the US Senate starts w/ re-electing @TomCottonAR. Together we’ll keep standing up for AR values like supporting Law Enforcement our Second Amendment the Unborn & more. He’s earned #SixMoreYears and I’m proud to serve with him. #VOTE #ARGOP #arpx https://t.co/rvMRxHegf6

Senate Republicans are standing between the country and the enactment of a radical agenda. Court packing and abolishing the filibuster are extreme ideas we simply can’t allow. Help us #HoldTheLine protect the Senate defend the Constitution and keep our majority.   #Election2020 https://t.co/zs2m8cAy1x

We’re getting the word out these last couple of days before #ElectionDay  reminding Arkansans to VOTE and keep our state RED + moving in the RIGHT direction. Our candidates — @TomCottonAR @ElectFrench @Crawford4Cong and more — need your help and support. Join us! #ARGOP #arpx https://t.co/YNgW5Hvs5b

Honored to speak to a group of North Pulaski Republican Women to discuss how important this election is and why we must be working to support all our @ARGOP candidates and especially my friend @ElectFrench — a proven leader and champion for central Arkansas. #ARGOP #arpx #AR02 https://t.co/dKcpztVZK6
Congrats to @CoachSamPittman and @RazorbackFB on a great win tonight. #WooPig #WPS 🐗 https://t.co/QRDGEngdgw
May God be with the president and his family during this time and give them a full recovery. #PrayForTrump https://t.co/hoBtxoJsSn
United States Supreme Court based on her intellect and the strength of her professional career in the legal community. That’s worth celebrating not tearing down or misconstruing. (3/3)

no matter how they might feel about the timing of her nomination. Attacks on Judge Barrett’s faith family or character should be off limits. She deserves nothing less and so does our nation.  A working mom of school-age children has been nominated to serve on the...(2/3)

Judge Amy Coney Barrett has impeccable credentials and received bipartisan confirmation to sit on the federal bench where she now serves as a judge on the 7th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals.   Democrats should treat her with the respect and seriousness she deserves...(1/3)

Arkansans expect the Republican Senate Majority to confirm well-qualified nominees to the federal bench including the Supreme Court. It’s part of our mandate.  I look forward to considering @realDonaldTrump’s nominee.   #FillTheSeat #arpx https://t.co/f5Iq2JWazI

I’m proud to receive an “A” rating on the @SBAList National #ProLife Scorecard for defending and lifting my voice on behalf of the most precious and vulnerable members of our society the unborn.  I’ll always stand for protecting the dignity and worth of every human life. #arpx https://t.co/CPwzPDbVT8

Voters will soon decide who will lead our nation over the next four years. At the 2020 @GOPconvention the @GOP laid out a clear vision that celebrates our country and puts America first — a message we must keep sharing until Election Day 🇺🇸  @ARGOP #arpx  https://t.co/X5riBvzBJF

.@RealBenCarson is exactly right. America is the shining city on a hill; a beacon of hope for the world.  His life is a perfect example of the heights anyone can reach in America. This truly is the land of opportunity. And we have to protect and preserve it. https://t.co/bWFho3IYND

.@ElectFrench is a champion for central Arkansas families and businesses. His voice is a respected one in Washington that benefits our state and the country. We need French to continue his vital leadership in Congress on behalf of #AR02 and the Natural State. #arpx #ARGOP https://t.co/0vtFl1utms

Sending my condolences to @realDonaldTrump and the entire Trump family on the loss of the president’s brother Robert.  May their family be comforted by the wonderful memories together and the prayers of the nation amid their mourning.

Proud of our state for advancing #ProLife policies that will save preborn children from brutal deaths and preserve the lives and dignity of babies and moms. We will keep fighting until the value of every human life is protected in law and in our hearts. #arpx @ARGOP https://t.co/EA17yf4OAV

.@TomCottonAR lays out clearly & thoughtfully why ranked-choice voting isn't something Arkansans should invite in our elections. We need clear contrasts not a complicated solution in search of a problem. Join us in rejecting this initiative. #arpx #ARGOP  https://t.co/18EZgb8Dnj

#HappyFourth🇺🇸 I’m proud to be an American and pass that deep love of our country & what it stands for down to new generations. She is that shining city on hill; the last best hope for freedom. Each day I’m reminded of how blessed we are to call this land home. #IndependenceDay https://t.co/3Rxx8p5q6T

Welcome #infrastructure investment for Arkansas. Excited to get this project started and following the economic development it spurs. It’s a pleasure to work with the Arkansas congressional delegation state & local leaders and the Trump Administration to get this project funded. https://t.co/9bxCE8xeKm
Today is Flag Day and the U.S. Army’s birthday two symbols of our country that we respect and take great pride in.  May God bless America 🇺🇸 https://t.co/viHRsMZfnJ

Proud to be part of @AR30DayFund effort to support Arkansas small businesses and entrepreneurs. During a time like this it’s important to help family friends and neighbors however we can. We’ll get through this together and a little generosity & compassion will go a long way. https://t.co/HJeaDsXQlt

First it was “Abolish ICE”  Now “Defund the Police”  Far-left radical rhetoric isn’t how we find solutions or get our country to heal. America needs to bridge the divide.  Let’s do the work that brings us together and finds the answers to our problems. We can and we must 🇺🇸

D-Day represents what Americans are capable of even when the night seems to be at its darkest. We honor the heroes who helped defend liberty and free a continent on the beaches of Normandy 76 years ago today. #DDay76   https://t.co/GF4wu5n4nY
Happy Birthday Canaan! Go Hogs 🐗 https://t.co/1vqGzcid4u

Today we #HonorTheFallen who courageously served & surrendered their lives so that we can live free.   “Greater love has no man than this than to lay down his life for his friends.”  #MemorialDay and each day we #HonorThem and pray for their loved ones. https://t.co/2HUvxrYUZN

Proud of @SarahHuckabee’s work to support Arkansas #smallbiz during this extraordinary time of hardship & adversity. @AR30DayFund will be another way to help save Natural State jobs and extend a needed lifeline to entrepreneurs.  #InThisTogether in action. https://t.co/g92QMPgnPN
#NationalPoliceWeek  We honor our brave law enforcement officers especially those who fall in the line of duty. May God bless them. https://t.co/BviQzuTD26
Happy Mother’s Day. President Lincoln said it well and I think many of us share his sentiment.  I hope every mom has a wonderful day and feels loved and appreciated 🌷💜 https://t.co/Ujwtys2nZL

Happy Easter Arkansas! Our Lord has risen.  This is a hard time for many but thankfully we also have reason to rejoice. Pray and keep the faith. We will get through this. Stay safe. https://t.co/P8qs3EJ7nv
#GoodFriday means #Easter Sunday is coming. The cross and tomb are not the final word. ✝️ https://t.co/pflTBTGGnd
#Jobs #Amazon #ARnews https://t.co/h6v3tTURDW

Yesterday I spoke with the president about making sure we acknowledge and pray for those working so incredibly hard to keep our supply chain strong — particularly when it comes to our food. The job they do is essential. We’re grateful for our farmers processors & distributors 🇺🇸 https://t.co/LLAIhZzdew

Great reminder from my friend French Hill to donate blood if you are able. Contact @ArkRedCross or @ABIblood to find the nearest donation center near you and make an appointment. It’s needed urgently. THANK YOU to those helping meet this need or serving in other ways. #COVID19Ark https://t.co/8O8pgIolW9

Blood donations🩸are still needed even amid the #COVID19 crisis. If you’re healthy & able please consider giving blood. It can help save lives.  RT to get the word out. We’re in this together and I know Arkansans will continue to serve each other well - as we always do. #arnews https://t.co/VMqaVj1tY7

Amen. I will join the president and so many other Americans in praying for our country. Our faith can be a great source of comfort and reassurance in times of trouble and uncertainty. Please pray with us. https://t.co/LsSCyQ5oGv

Remember to get out and vote in today’s primary. It’s so important we mobilize to ensure the achievements & momentum we’ve gained in recent years are not put at risk. We’re grateful for all the candidates willing to step up and lead in their communities & our state. #aprx #ARGOP

Several Democrat Presidential candidates have been in Arkansas ahead of #SuperTuesday. Their radical message of taxpayer funding for abortion big government healthcare anti-second amendment banning fossil fuels and more just aren’t policies we want here. Not even close. #arpx

This is a tragedy. I supported these bills because I believe in upholding the sanctity and dignity of every human life. Protecting abortion survivors and unborn babies who can feel pain shouldn’t even be controversial. I made clear where I stand. #ProLife  https://t.co/hNEIZ365XB

I can’t think of a better partner in the Senate than @TomCottonAR. A leader of the conservative movement he stands for Arkansas values & fights for the needs of every Arkansan. I’m pleased to endorse Tom & look forward to building on all we’ve accomplished together in the Senate

.@AIPAC gives voice to the bipartisan view that the US-Israel relationship must always remain strong. Puzzling to hear a defender of the Castro regime and the USSR paint these Pro-Israel advocates as intolerant. I reject that unequivocally and stand with my friends at #AIPAC2020 https://t.co/k0LOm0H8Sm

Farmers feed clothe & shelter us. They know more about a hard honest day's work than just about anybody else. Their grit determination & dedication is what we need more of – and should pray for. I'm proud Arkansas is home to so many and doesn't forget or dismiss what they do. https://t.co/NbgRnW0pMx

Amazing. Every unborn child has a right to live and we’ve taken even greater steps to ensure that under this administration. I’m thrilled @realDonaldTrump took the historic step of addressing the @March_for_Life in person this year.  RT if you’re #ProLife https://t.co/mm7aYPiNLK
